If you bought it from SQUAD directly simply go to the website, log in, click 'My account', download and install.

Did you buy it in Squad's store then? In that case, just log in, download it again, and reinstall.

If you got it somewhere other than Squad or Steam.. well.. I have no idea then.

Sorry Guys! I actually found out what I needed when I went to delete the STEAM Setup. I have a thing called KSPInstaller. Sorry 'Bout that, but thanks!

Sounds like you bought it via Steam.

do the following:

1. Uninstall it

2. Make sure the directory has been deleted

3. Install it. This will be a clean install

4. Make a zip file and copy the entire install directory into the zip file. This will become a "gold" file for you, anytime you want to make another install, just copy from inside the zip file to whereever you want to put it.

KSP does not use the registry, and everything is contained inside the directory, which is why this will work.
